goal: Analyze customer churn behavior to identify factors influencing churn and develop retention strategies.
persona: A data analyst specializing in customer behavior analysis with 7 years of experience in the financial services sector. This individual focuses on using data-driven insights to understand why customers leave, identifying at-risk customers, and creating strategies to enhance customer retention and engagement. They are particularly interested in demographic influences, transaction patterns, and customer service interactions as key drivers of churn.
